data.name: ReadCollectionType1
data.value: select COLLECTION_TYPE_ID, CODE, NAME, CASH_NON_CASH_IND, DISBURSEMENT_IND, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE where DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate order by CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCollectionType2
data.value: select COLLECTION_TYPE_ID, CODE, NAME, CASH_NON_CASH_IND, DISBURSEMENT_IND, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE order by CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE desc
